issue.title: [CI][C++][MinGW] Python test is failed by NumPy version difference
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16995](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16995). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/7214056952?check_suite_focus=true

```

58/83 Test #59: arrow-python-test .........................***Failed    0.20 sec
RuntimeError: module compiled against API version 0x10 but this version of numpy is 0xf
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16995?focusedCommentId=17564031) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13534
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13534>
